column5: Newly renovated property that's close to AT&T Stadium, Six Flags, Rangers Ballpark, Hurricane Harbor, The Parks at Arlington Mall, Arlington Highlands Mall and much more! Our property is located conveniently close to everything you need in Arlington and within minutes to I-20 & TX-360. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.  This property will truly be your home away from home. Fully furnished with comfy beds!
column8: Near Stadium, Cozy, Quiet, & Conveniently Located
